title: Education, Therapy, and Support for Individuals with Autism Spectrum Disorders
banerDescription: Gain qualifications to work with individuals on the autism spectrum and expand your knowledge in education and therapy.
description:
• Teachers wishing to obtain qualifications to teach a second subject
  • Individuals wanting to expand their knowledge in education and therapy for people with autism spectrum disorders
  • Specialists interested in working with individuals with autism
description2: The studies are qualification-oriented, enabling Teachers to obtain the right to teach a second subject. The study program is focused on equipping teachers with substantive knowledge, covering education in the scope necessary to implement the content included in the core curriculum of general education in a given subject.
description3: The studies provide practical knowledge, gathered through internships, aimed at gaining experiences related to the didactic and educational work of a teacher and confronting the acquired knowledge in the field of didactics with pedagogical reality in practical action.

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced practitioners in the field of special education, psychology, and therapy for individuals with autism spectrum disorders.
practices:
• Internship Module I includes 60 hours and focuses on introducing work with individuals with autism.
  • Internship Module II includes 120 hours and allows for deepening experience in therapy and education of individuals with autism spectrum.
  • Internships can be carried out in special institutions, integrative schools, and therapeutic centers.
evaluation: Assessment of learning outcomes is based on activity during classes, completion of individual modules, and preparation of a diploma thesis.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • Supporting teachers in integrative and special schools
  • Therapists for individuals with autism spectrum disorders
  • Education and therapy specialists in special institutions
  • Consultants in educational and therapeutic institutions
  • Employees of support centers for individuals with autism and their families
invite: Gain the qualifications and skills necessary to work with individuals on the autism spectrum.
